text.*:
This article is in a list format that may be better presented using prose. You can help by converting this article to prose, if appropriate. Editing help is available. (February 2016)

Fight and Smile (相信希望fight & smile賑災募款晚會) is a fund raising campaign held in Taiwan for the victims of the Japan 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami. The event was held from March 17 to March 18, 2011. About NT$788 million were raised by the event.[1] The event was hosted by Jacky Wu, Chang Fei (張菲), Chang Hsiao-yen (張小燕) and Patty Hou.

Participants[edit]

About 300 celebrities participated in the event.[2][3][4] The following are some of the participants at the concert. The list is incomplete.

  • A-mei
  • Stefanie Sun
  • Jody Chiang
  • Mike He
  • Vivian Hsu
  • Ken Chu
  • Hui Xu-jie (許傑輝)
  • Lu Chen (劉謙)
  • Ella Chen
  • Chie Tanaka
  • Dee Shu
  • Jerry Yan
  • Wu Bai
  • Fahrenheit
  • Hidetoshi Nakata
  • Pai Bing-bing
  • Hsu Nai-lin (徐乃麟)
  • Li Jing
  • SMAP
  • Wang Bun-yun (黃品源)
  • Kay Huang (黃韻玲)
  • Wang Wei-zhong (王偉忠)
  • JJ Lin
  • Blackie
  • Van Fan
  • Lin Chi-ling (from remote)
  • Jolin Tsai (from remote)
  • Jay Chou (from remote)
  • Show Lo (from remote)
  • Selina Ren (from remote)

  3. ^ "大纪元 - "相信希望"晚会赈灾 百位艺人为日本祈福". Epochtimes.com. Retrieved 2011-04-04. 
  4. ^ "台灣演藝界賑災晚會籌款1.73億". Big5.ifeng.com. Retrieved 2011-04-04.
